resources.string: The one where you draw things

Welcome to The Doodler! The screen you start off with is the main canvas. The 2 buttons on the top are the colours. Tap on a button to select the colour, then trace your finger on the canvas below to draw!
To change colours, hold on to the buttons on top (either) to take you to the colour select page. Choose your colour, brush size, then press the Done button (or the back key on your phone).
To save, go to the menu and press Save.
To load an image, press the Load.
To clear the canvas off, press Clear Screen.
 To import a PDF file and draw on it, your phone must have Android Lollipop or a higher version (API 21). It is still in testing.
